titles.title: A bill for the relief of John A. Smrekar.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 5/2/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to grant to a named individual the right to use, and access to, certain property in Minnesota during a specified period of time.
